{"id":515314583,"lang":"cpp","time":"11 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1625044928,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/515314583/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double one;\n    double mul(double a,double b){\n        return a*b;\n    }\n    double qmul(long int n){\n        if(n==1){\n            return one;\n        }\n        double tmp=qmul(n/2);\n        tmp=mul(tmp,tmp);\n        if(n%2==1){\n            tmp=mul(one,tmp);\n        }\n        return tmp;\n    }\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        long int m=n;\n        one=x;\n        if(m==0) return 1;\n        if(m<0){\n            return 1/qmul(-m);\n        }\n        else return qmul(m);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
